alert.note: Alert for Newton; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rockdale, central Walton and northeastern Newton Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Gum Creek, or near Conyers, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Monroe, Covington, Social Circle, Oxford, Walnut Grove, Between, Jersey, Georgia International Horse Park, Milstead, Youth, Big Haynes Creek Park, Pannell, Herndonville, and Gum Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
